c.t: 32.0408.01 Every Prime Contractor Must List Their Subcontractors and Suppliers for Each Contract to Prevent Bid Shopping. Each Contractor Must Have a Valid Tribal License up to Date Through Tero in Order for Their Bid to Be Considered.(Amended-Resolution No. Tmbc338-06-19)

c.x: All parties may present testimony of witnesses and other evidence and may b
The Commission shall be responsible for taping the proceedings and preservi
The Commission may have the advice and assistance at the hearing of general
The Chairman of the Commission or the Vice Chairman may preside.  No formal
Any matter to be proven must be proven to the satisfaction of the Commissio
The hearing may be continued at the discretion of the Commission or Directo
At the final close of the hearing, the Commission may take immediate action
The Commission or Director shall notify all parties within 30 days after it
The Commission may require the presence of persons and documents at the hea
Any party leaving a scheduled meeting will be subject to entry of an advers
Any party not appearing for a scheduled meeting will be subject to an adver
Complaints must be filed within 30 days of incident with the TERO Office ot
